name: Aventuras con Rodrigo: Símbolos de la piñata
name_original: Aventuras con Rodrigo: Símbolos de la piñata
description:
It is likely you have hit a piñata at some point in your life, but do you know what the symbolism is behind the traditional piñata? In this educational game you will learn that symbolism in Spanish, and/or English, get introduced to a piñata song in Spanish, and have a go at cracking open a digital piñata!

Created by Jeremy A. Robinson and Nicole Cundiff at the Culpeper Language Learning Center of Gustavus Adolphus College..
